title: Ultralong-Range Electric Cars Are Arriving. Say Goodbye to Charging Stops
description: We drove 1,000 miles across two countries without stopping just to charge, thanks to a new class of EVs

title: Twitter Loses Second Safety Executive Within Days
description: A.J. Brown, head of brand safety and ad quality, is leaving the company, the second departure of a top safety executive this week, as the company struggles to persuade advertisers to return to its platform.

title: Startups in Virtual and Augmented Reality Pin Hopes on Apple Headset
description: After early enthusiasm waned, virtual-reality startups and investors are hoping Apple’s new headset reignites excitement.

title: Twitter's Top Content Moderation and Safety Executive Leaves
description: Ella Irwin, who declined to discuss her reason for leaving, departed on a day when Elon Musk said Twitter employees erred in how they handled a documentary.

title: Meta Requires Office Workers to Return Three Days a Week
description: The change will take effect Sept. 5 for employees already assigned to an office, while remote workers’ status won’t change, the company said.
